    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
        java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a stream to an other ones.
        Streams aren't not closed at the end of the copy, it is the caller job
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream source
        outputStream - Stream destination
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On copy issue

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
        java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
        long length)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a stream to an other ones.
        The copy it limited to a number of bytes to copy. If the source is shoerter than the specified length, all the source is copied, if it is bigger, only the first length< are copied
        Streams aren't not closed at the end of the copy, it is the caller job
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream source
        outputStream - Stream destination
        length - Number of maximum of bytes to copy
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On copy issue

        Parameters:

        true if directory exists after the method execution

      • createFile

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(java.io.File file)
        Delete a file or a directory. If it is a directory, all sub directories and files are deleted also
        Parameters:
        file - File or directory to delete
        Returns:
        true if deletion completly succed. If false return, the deletion may be partial (For a directory, some files have be deleted, some don't) of may realy happen when application exit

      • readBinarizable

        public static <B extends Binarizable> B readBinarizable(java.lang.Class<B> clas,
                                        java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Read a Binarizable inside a stream.
        The Binarizable should be previously written by writeBinarizable(Binarizable, OutputStream)
        Type Parameters:
        B - Binarizable type
        Parameters:
        clas - Class of the Binarizable
        inputStream - Stream to read
        Returns:
        The Binarizable read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On read the stream or the data not represents the asked Binarizable

        public static byte[] readExactArraySize(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                        int length)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read an exact number of bytes in a stream.
        If the stream is not long enough an exception is throw
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to read
        length - Number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        Read bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On reading issue, or if the stream doesn't contains enough bytes
